titleStmt.title: The loue and complayntes bytwene Mars and Venus
titleStmt.author: Chaucer, Geoffrey, d. 1400.

notesStmt.note: Includes: "The campleynt. of Mars", "The compleynt of Venus for Mars", and "The cou[n]ceyll of Chaucer touchyng maryag [et] c. whiche was sente te [sic] Bucketon [et] c.", all by Geoffrey Chaucer; and "The fyrst fynders of the vii. scyences artyficyall", an unidentified text.
Colophon reads: Thys in pryntyde in westmoster inkyng. strete. For me Iulianus Notarii [all sic].
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
